Articles.Content: @Sonic: I can't work on an RSS config while your V4 files prevent rss from working.
Sonic you seem to be doing fine, as your new avatar and title attest perfect sanity. Shingeki no Kyojin is soooo badass !
when i am use this is mod and EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements my game crashed. what do I do?

when i am use this is mod and EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements my game crashed. what do I do?

At what point did it crash? It's quite cpu intensive, if you're running large part mods/ other graphics mods (like hi-res textures) try removing them.
Hey Sonic, is it normal that the DetailCity.tga file is located both in Clouds and in CityLights ?

Hey Sonic, is it normal that the DetailCity.tga file is located both in Clouds and in CityLights ?

detail.tga should be the only one in city lights. DetailCity.tga should be in clouds.

detail.tga should be the only one in city lights. DetailCity.tga should be in clouds.

Oh yes, thanks, I had wrongly copied DetailCity in both folders !

Oh and I was mistakenly not installing your RSS folder.

Silly Me ^^

PS : Is there a HiRes MÃƒÂ¼n texture you recommend that is compatible with BA ?

Edited April 24, 2014 by vanlock

@Sonic: I can't work on an RSS config while your V4 files prevent rss from working.

Copy the AtmosphereFromGround {} nodes from BA's RSS.cfg to the same places in your old RSS.cfg. Then use your old RSS.cfg.
The entirety of Eeloo should be covered in a thin fog. As if it was nitrogen.

Yeah me too, but managed to get the atmosphere to work *kinda* by toying around with the rss config, although it doesn't have a gradient atmosphere anymore just straight blue :/ it's black until hitting 'reset to default'.

Could you just compile the RSS config then distribute that?

hello again fine sir! fantastic mod with easy to use GUI. i found a way around the having to do the alt+N ever time you start the game..... you can delete the lines of code that you dont want and WALA its perma.

how can i change the radius of the fluffy clouds? it seems a bit small for my liking

i meant to say how do i define the render limit where fluffy meets flat texture.

Edited April 25, 2014 by praise the suuun
When I am in very low Jool orbit, the atmosphere freaks out, doing annoying flashing, ughh

i meant to say how do i define the render limit where fluffy meets flat texture.

Gamedata>Environmental Enhancements>Settings You can increace the Hex radius and the segment division, my pc crashes with a division above 5.. and my pc isn't exactly weak

Edited April 25, 2014 by pingopete

I'm not gonna work on the RSS config until rbray brings out the next VE, which will bring about many changes to the config system and improvements for RSS. This won't be for a while and I have upcoming exams etc. There simply isn't any real point in working with the dodgy system on rss until these improvements are out, sorry.
No Problem Pete, focus on your exams, that's a good thing
had to stop playing for a while before entrance test, now back to KSP

i wish i could show you

why not. Ah right, because you're a mod dev and we're not.. I see how it is!

EDIT: Sonic, you should down sample the blank atmo texture, it's an 8k texture but it's plain white, was causing crashes until I down scaled it :/
